titleStmt.title: By the Queene the Queenes Maiestie geueth all maner her subiectes to vnerstande, that where of late it hath ben agreed at Brugis in Flaunders, in a treatie for matters of entercourse of marchaundize ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprinted at London in Powles Churchyarde :

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first 3 lines of text.
Contains woodcut initial with illustration of Neptune and two sea horses.
"Yeuen at her Maiesties Pallaice of Westminster, the xvi. day of October 1565. In the seuenth yere of her Maiesties raigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
